excerpt: "The Pirates activated Tom (back) from the 10-day injured list Monday and designated him for assignment, Mike Persak of the Pittsburgh Post-Gazette reports. Tom will be cast off an organization's 40-man roster for the second time this season after the Athletics previously designated him for assignment in April."
